li.label: nefarious drone (mild)
li.description: It... is everywhere, coldly analyzing our every move. I want to escape this planet, but it... is everywhere!

li.label: nefarious drone (strong)
li.description: Deceit... Distortion... Extremism... they are so numb, yet so decayed. In truth, we are all sick.

li.label: nefarious drone (intense)
li.description: I feel its hatred inside me, the way I feel my own emotions. The world is still so vast, yet this body is already tired.
